subject: RE: Q [Kent]: [junit] junitreport is not working properly with for Tests written with JUnit4.x
msgSnippet: Saurav, I don t have any current information about Ant and JUnit 4. I know that they intend to support JUnit 4 in their 1.7 release. Sincerely yours, Kent Beck
messageBody:
Saurav,

I don't have any current information about Ant and JUnit 4. I know that they
intend to support JUnit 4 in their 1.7 release.

Sincerely yours,

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute
> -----Original Message-----
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On
> Behalf Of saurav kumar
> Sent: Friday, May 26, 2006 2:31 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Q [Kent]: [junit] junitreport is not working
> properly with for Tests written with JUnit4.x
>
> Kent do u have solution for using JUnit4.x with ant 1.6.5 ?
>
> sauravkr <sauravkr@...> wrote: ant task junitreport is
> not listing names of test methods instead of it is
> printing unkown for Tests written with JUnit4.x(using annotation)
>
> Name Status Type Time(s)
> unknown Success 0.016
> unknown Success 0.000
> unknown Success 0.000
> unknown Success 0.000
>
>
> If I am extending my classes with TestCase (3.8.1 style) then it is
> working fine. Can anybody give idea? I am using ANT 1.6.5
